dmca.title: [ABUSE] DragonBlade Cease and Desist- ThePlanet.com and Blue Laser.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 10, 2005 8:55 AM
To: hreisman@rogers.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DragonBlade Cease and Desist- ThePlanet.com and Blue
Laser.com]

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] DragonBlade Cease and Desist- ThePlanet.com and Blue
Laser.com
Date:         Mon, 9 May 2005 20:22:59 -0400 (EDT)
From:         Hatty Reisman <hreisman@rogers.com>
To:         admins@theplanet.com, abuse@theplanet.com
CC:         wayne kennedy <wayne@zebradevelopment.com>, Justin Wong
<justin@dcdcorp.com>, Jonathan Reichman <jreichman@kenyon.com>, Hatty
Reisman <hreisman@rogers.com>



Please see attached Cease and Desist request, together with copies of the
relevant webpages from Blue Laser web site as well as the ARIN Details
report for ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

Please confirm receipt and advise of steps being taken to comply.

Thank you.

Hatty


Hatty


Hatty Reisman
(b) 416-944-1747
(c) 416-220-6811
hreisman@rogers.com

--
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/

                                                                                                                                             HARRIET F. REISMAN
Barrister & Solicitor  
252 Poplar Plains Rd  Toronto, Ont  M4V 2N7 B: (416) 944-1747  (Cell): 416-220-6811 hreisman @rogers.com

May 9, 2005

Via Email and Registered Delivery

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110,
Dallas Texas
75207, 
United States of  America

admins@theplanet.com
abuse@theplanet.com


		Re:	Violation of Intellectual Property Rights and Bluelaser.com
